alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm with heavy rain and lightning will move over Florence and Marion counties... At 1156 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorm near Timmonsville and Hannah, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Possible power outage and ponding of water in low-lying areas. Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Lake City, Mullins, Timmonsville, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Quinby, Blue Brick, Zion, Mars Bluff, Gapway, Poston, Cartersville, Brittons Neck, Rains, Gresham, New Hope, Sardis and Hyman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 near mile marker 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 148 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
